statements: SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE harvest_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE harvest_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_name LIKE 'W%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_crops FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthData WHERE soil_ph < 6.0;
SELECT crop_name, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, nutrients_level FROM SoilHealthData WHERE moisture_level = 'optimal';
SELECT * FROM CropRotationSchedule ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE harvest_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%' AND planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT c.crop_name, s.soil_ph, s.nutrients_level FROM CropRotationSchedule c JOIN SoilHealthData s ON c.id = s.crop_id WHERE s.moisture_level = 'Optimal' ORDER BY c.planting_date ASC;
SELECT c.crop_name, s.soil_ph, s.moisture_level FROM CropRotationSchedule c JOIN SoilHealthData s ON c.id = s.crop_id WHERE s.nutrients_level IN ('Low', 'Medium') AND c.planting_date < '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM soil_health ORDER BY nutrient_levels DESC;
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM field_conditions WHERE pest_control = 'None';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM soil_health WHERE nutrient_levels LIKE '%high%';
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM field_conditions ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule cs JOIN soil_health sh ON cs.crop_name = sh.crop_name WHERE cs.planting_date < '2023-06-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT field_name, soil_type FROM field_info ORDER BY soil_type DESC;
SELECT sample_date, nutrient_levels FROM soil_analysis WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, yield_date FROM crop_yield WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC, harvesting_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvesting_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' OR crop_name = 'Soybean' ORDER BY planting_date;
SELECT field_name, soil_type, crop_name FROM field_info JOIN crop_rotation_schedule ON field_info.crop_rotation_id = crop_rotation_schedule.id ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT field_name, sample_date, nutrient_levels FROM field_info JOIN soil_analysis ON field_info.field_id = soil_analysis.field_id WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_amount, yield_date FROM crop_yield JOIN field_info ON crop_yield.field_id = field_info.field_id WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT variety_name, growth_duration FROM crop_varieties WHERE planting_depth > 2.5;
SELECT field_id, soil_ph, nutrient_levels FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE moisture_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_schedule ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_rotation_schedule WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM field_information WHERE field_size > 100 ORDER BY field_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_varieties WHERE planting_depth < 3.0 ORDER BY growth_duration ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE moisture_level > 20 ORDER BY moisture_level DESC LIMIT 5;
